mapper.insert:
select MESSAGE_TB_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into MESSAGE_TB values ( #{id}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgContent}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE_TB where #{side} = #{nickName} RECEIVER_DEL_CHK = 0

select B.rnum, B.msg_seq, B.msg_title, B.msg_content, B.sender, B.receiver,B.receiver_chk,B.sender_del_chk, B.receiver_del_chk,B.send_date FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, A.msg_seq, A.msg_title, A.msg_content, A.sender, A.receiver, A.receiver_chk, A.sender_del_chk,A.receiver_del_chk,A.send_date FROM ( select msg_seq, msg_title, msg_content,sender,receiver,receiver_chk, sender_del_chk,receiver_del_chk,send_date from MESSAGE_TB WHERE SENDER = #{boardName} ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endNum} ) B where B.rnum >= #{startNum}

select B.rnum, B.msg_seq, B.msg_title, B.msg_content, B.sender, B.receiver,B.receiver_chk,B.sender_del_chk, B.receiver_del_chk,B.send_date FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, A.msg_seq, A.msg_title, A.msg_content, A.sender, A.receiver, A.receiver_chk, A.sender_del_chk,A.receiver_del_chk,A.send_date FROM ( select msg_seq, msg_title, msg_content,sender,receiver,receiver_chk, sender_del_chk,receiver_del_chk,send_date from MESSAGE_TB WHERE receiver = #{boardName} ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endNum} ) B where B.rnum >= #{startNum}
select count(*) as a from(select * from MESSAGE_TB where RECEIVER =#{nickName} ) where receiver_chk =0
mapper.update: update message_tb set receiver_chk=1 where msg_seq = #{msgSeq}
